汧字的基本解释

汧
qiān
〔汧水〕今千河的古称，源出中国甘肃省，流经陕西省入渭河。

汧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦堅切，平先，溪。］
［《廣韻》苦甸切，去霰，溪。］
(1)流水停积处。
(2)漂，冲击。
(3)古邑名。西周末秦穆公所都。秦置县，治所在今陕西省陇县南。古称汧阳，今名千阳。
(4)古山名。即岍山。在今陕西省陇县西南。
(5)水名。渭水支流，今名千河。源出甘肃省六盘山南麓，上游东南流经陕西省陇县千阳注入渭河。古以河中出五色鱼，因又称为龙鱼川。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·渭水二》。

汧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汧； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页607第08
【正字通】與汧同，俗省。

【唐韻】【正韻】苦堅切【集韻】【韻會】輕煙切，?音牽。水名。【說文】水出扶風汧縣，西北入渭。【水經注】汧水，出汧縣蒲谷鄕弦中谷。【爾雅·釋水】汧出不流。【註】水泉潛出，自停成汙池也。又水決之澤爲汧。【疏】凡水爲人所決，爲陂障者，亦與出不流者，名爲汧。　又汧陽，縣名。【廣輿記】屬鳳翔府，漢隃糜，後周汧陽。　又【唐韻】苦薦切。【集韻】輕甸切，?音俔。又【集韻】詰定切，音罄。義?同。　又【集韻】倪堅切，音姸。淨也。

汧字的起名意思

[汧阳]地名。在陕西省。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
qiān
[Lishui] The ancient name of the Qianhe River today originated from Gansu Province, China, and flows through Shaanxi Province into the Weihe River.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" bitter and hard cut, flat first, stream. ]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, go to Cha, Xi. ]
(1) Where the flowing water stops.
(2) Drift and shock.
(3) The name of the ancient town. The Qin Mu Residence on the Western Weekend. The Qin Dynasty was home to the county and was governed in the south of Longxian County, Shaanxi Province. It was called Liyang in ancient times and Qianyang today.
(4) Ancient mountain name. That is, the mountain. In today's southwest of Long County, Shaanxi Province.
(5) Water name. The Weishui tributary is now called Qianhe. It originates from the southern foot of Liupan Mountain in Gansu Province, and flows from the southeast upstream to the Weihe River through Qianyang, Long County, Shaanxi Province. Five-color fishes emerge from the ancient river, which is also known as Longyuchuan. Refer to Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Shui Jing Zhu·Wei Shui II".
Li

[Erya·Shuishui] No flow out. [Note] The water spring submerged out and turned into a dirty pond by itself. Name meaning
[Liyang] Place name. In Shaanxi Province.
qiān
I сущ.
* пруд, непроточное озеро
II собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 汧水) Цяньшуй (река в пров. Шэньси)
